channel.title: Course Learning on Geng Niu's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Course Learning on Geng Niu's Blog

item.title: [LanguageLearn] TOEFL Learning Log
item.description:
TOEFL (Test of English as a Foreign Language) is a globally acknowledged English proficiency test, similar to IELTS but with its own distinct characteristics. As an international student aspiring to pursue a Ph.D. program, achieving a competitive TOEFL score is a prerequisite. With this in mind, I have created this blog as a personal log to document my TOEFL learning journey and provide assistance throughout the process.

Learning material: TOEFL KMF, which includes all TPOs and lots of tools to promote my TOEFL.
Learning time: 2 Hours at least.

  • Build a figure reflecting the learning time of four parts by Matlab. Publish the code and insect the figure on this page.
  • Take a pre-exam period and give a figure to predict the scores getting in the test.
